snippet: A rollover crash that occurred during routine training at Camp Pendleton Marine Base left one Marine dead and 18 injured on Thursday.
abstract: One Marine is killed and 18 others injured in vehicular crash during routine training at Camp Pendleton Marine base in California.
lead_paragraph: A rollover crash that occurred during routine training at Camp Pendleton Marine Base left one Marine dead and 18 injured on Thursday.

headline.main: California: Marine Killed and 18 Injured in Accident
headline.print_headline: California: Marine Killed and 18 Injured in Accident
